definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: The key to success for Otis is team-work spirit.
sentences.chinese: 奧的斯的成敗繫於團隊精神。

sentences.english: They acknowledge that holding a part-time job can teach teens about responsibility and teamwork.
sentences.chinese: 他們承認做兼職工作能使青少年有責任感和團隊精神。

sentences.english: Do not let what is going on around you whipsaw your strategy and your team.
sentences.chinese: 不要被周圍的紛擾阻礙了你的策略，破壞了團隊精神。

sentences.english: Strong individual working capability, flexibility plus team-oriented spirit.
sentences.chinese: 具備強的獨立工作和應變能力，同時又有團隊精神。

sentences.english: Good coordination skill and pro-active, a good team-worker.
sentences.chinese: 具有很好的協調能力，做事積極主動，具有團隊精神。

sentences.english: Sport imbues in young people a sense of responsibility and team work.
sentences.chinese: 體育使年輕人感受到了責任感和團隊精神。

sentences.english: It should involve fair play, team spirit and individual excellence.
sentences.chinese: 它包括公平比賽，團隊精神和個人能力。

sentences.english: Once was institute propaganda department vice-minister , has the good team spirit.
sentences.chinese: 曾擔任學院宣傳部副部長，具有良好的團隊精神。

sentences.english: In addition, the trampolinists need developing collective spirit and combatant spirit.
sentences.chinese: 此外，運動員還需要發揚團隊精神和拼搏精神。

sentences.english: A team player with good inter-personal communication skills;
sentences.chinese: 有團隊精神以及良好的人際溝通能力。

sentences.english: The team with great co-work spirit, and with great technology and high relatives .
sentences.chinese: 是一支以團隊精神爲核心的高技術隊伍。

sentences.english: A man of capability, confidence, preciseness and team-spirit.
sentences.chinese: 適應性強，責任心強，譯文嚴謹，良好的團隊精神。

sentences.english: There is also a good team spirit between the members of the Irish group.
sentences.chinese: 愛爾蘭陶藝家之間具有非常良好的團隊精神。

sentences.english: The spirited young organization has more team spirit.
sentences.chinese: 這個生氣勃勃少年組織很有團隊精神。

sentences.english: My name is Liu Yang, is a lively and cheerful student, have a strong team spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我叫劉楊，是個活潑開朗的學生，有很強的團隊精神。

sentences.english: The second reason is the old ways, the lack of a collective team spirit.
sentences.chinese: 原因之二是我行我素，缺乏一種集體的團隊精神。

definition: to bear hardships and work hard (idiom); assiduous and long-suffering/hard-working and capable of overcoming adversity
to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
to make learning fun/to combine education and entertainment
(abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
(personal) warmth/approachability/accessibility/(in a product) user friendliness/(chemistry) affinity
to do with the masses/mass (meeting, movement etc)
cross a river in the same boat (idiom); fig. having common interests/obliged to collaborate towards common goals
